title: Online-Based Transversal Skills Development Program for Doctoral Researchers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of research methodologies and basic mathematical literacy
context.additional_context: Establishment of a blended learning environment using smartphones, combining offline classroom instruction with online supplementary activities

learning_goals: Learners enhance self-directed learning abilities by utilizing over 90% of asynchronous lecture materials provided twice weekly via an online platform.
Learners improve research design competencies by 30% through peer feedback and instructor coaching in real-time video sessions.

Learners demonstrate the ability to apply cross-functional skills (e.g., project management, data visualization, academic writing) with over 80% achievement in at least four out of five module-based assessment tasks.

resources: Low-Spec Mobile App Compatibility Evaluation Tool
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
